verses.verse: Then God <S%H430><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words, <S%H1697><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> who <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery. <S%H5650><s%>
"You shall have <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> Me.

"You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> for yourself an idol, <S%H6459><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> likeness <S%H8544><s%> of what <S%H834><s%> is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> or on the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath <S%H8478><s%> or in the water <S%H4325><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

"You shall not worship <S%H7812><s%> them or serve <S%H5647><s%> them; for I, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers on the children, <S%H1><s%> on the third <S%H1121><s%> and the fourth <S%H8029><s%> generations of those who hate <S%H7256><s%> Me,
but showing <S%H6213><s%> lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> to thousands, <S%H505><s%> to those who love <S%H157><s%> Me and keep <S%H8104><s%> My commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

"You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain, <S%H7723><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will not leave <S%H5352><s%> him unpunished <S%H5352><s%> who <S%H834><s%> takes <S%H5375><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
"Remember <S%H2142><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> to keep <S%H6942><s%> it holy. <S%H6942><s%>
"Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall labor <S%H5647><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your work, <S%H4399><s%>

but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God; <S%H430><s%> [in it] you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> you or your son <S%H1121><s%> or your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> your male <S%H5650><s%> or your female <S%H519><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> <S%H519><s%> or your cattle <S%H929><s%> or your sojourner <S%H1616><s%> who <S%H834><s%> stays with you.

"For in six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> and the earth, <S%H776><s%> the sea <S%H3220><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that is in them, and rested <S%H5117><s%> on the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day; <S%H3117><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> and made <S%H6942><s%> it holy. <S%H6942><s%>

"Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father and your mother, <S%H1><s%> that your days <S%H517><s%> may be prolonged <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H748><s%> which <S%H127><s%> the Lord <S%H834><s%> your God <S%H3068><s%> gives <S%H430><s%> you.
"You shall not murder. <S%H7523><s%>
"You shall not commit <S%H5003><s%> adultery. <S%H5003><s%>
"You shall not steal. <S%H1589><s%>
"You shall not bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H8267><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

"You shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor <S%H7453><s%>'s house; <S%H1004><s%> you shall not covet <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor's wife <S%H802><s%> or his male <S%H5650><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> or his female <S%H519><s%> servant <S%H519><s%> or his ox <S%H7794><s%> or his donkey <S%H2543><s%> or anything <S%H3605><s%> that belongs to your neighbor."

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> perceived <S%H7200><s%> the thunder <S%H6963><s%> and the lightning <S%H3940><s%> flashes <S%H3940><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> smoking; <S%H6226><s%> and when the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> [it,] they trembled <S%H5128><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> at a distance. <S%H7350><s%>

Then they said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Speak <S%H1696><s%> to us yourself <S%H859><s%> and we will listen; <S%H8085><s%> but let not God <S%H430><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> to us, lest <S%H6435><s%> we die. <S%H4191><s%>"

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the people, <S%H5971><s%> "Do not be afraid; <S%H3372><s%> for God <S%H430><s%> has come <S%H935><s%> in order <S%H5668><s%> to test <S%H5254><s%> you, and in order <S%H5668><s%> that the fear <S%H3374><s%> of Him may remain <S%H1961><s%> <S%H6440><s%> with you, so that you may not sin. <S%H2398><s%>"

So the people <S%H5971><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> at a distance, <S%H7350><s%> while Moses <S%H4872><s%> approached <S%H5066><s%> the thick <S%H6205><s%> cloud <S%H6205><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> God <S%H430><s%> [was.]

Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Thus <S%H3541><s%> you shall say <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'You yourselves <S%H9043><s%> have seen <S%H7200><s%> that I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you from heaven. <S%H8064><s%>

'You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> [other gods <S%H430><s%>] besides <S%H854><s%> Me; gods <S%H430><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%> or gods of gold, <S%H2091><s%> you shall not make <S%H6213><s%> for yourselves. <S%H9043><s%>

'You shall make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> of earth <S%H127><s%> for Me, and you shall sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> on it your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings <S%H5930><s%> and your peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, <S%H8002><s%> your sheep <S%H6629><s%> and your oxen; <S%H1241><s%> in every <S%H3605><s%> place <S%H4725><s%> where <S%H834><s%> I cause My name <S%H8034><s%> to be remembered, <S%H2142><s%> I will come <S%H935><s%> to you and bless <S%H1288><s%> you.

'And if <S%H518><s%> you make <S%H6213><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> of stone <S%H68><s%> for Me, you shall not build <S%H1129><s%> it of cut <S%H1496><s%> stones, <S%H1496><s%> for if you wield <S%H5130><s%> your tool <S%H2719><s%> on it, you will profane <S%H2490><s%> it.
'And you shall not go <S%H5927><s%> up by steps <S%H4609><s%> to My altar, <S%H4196><s%> that your nakedness <S%H6172><s%> may not be exposed <S%H1540><s%> on it.'
